projects.title: GAVE&GOT
projects.description: GAVE&GOT is a personal project I developed to foster integration among Arabs in the Netherlands. It serves as a community platform where individuals can assist one another, exchange information, and find housing, as well as buy and sell products.

projects.title: BetyDecor
projects.description: I have successfully designed and built this landing page for BetyDecor, an interior design agency.

projects.title: SoliLMS
projects.description: SoliLMS is a learning management system developed collaboratively during my studies at SOLICODE Center. The project was divided into different packages, with each team member responsible for a specific package. We employed the SCRUM methodology for efficient collaboration, and my primary responsibility was to develop an HR management system using the Repository Design Pattern and implementing unit tests.
